law.text: The Auditor shall reside and keep his office at the seat of government.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 51. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 4; and ch. 27, sec. 19. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 138, 141.
